title: Daniel's Wife
description: Jessica Weaver's life was perfect. Her handsome gregarious husband, a public relations consultant made a good salary and provided her with a lifestyle to be envied. However, when Daniel goes away on a business trip and doesn't return, Jessica, whose world revolved around her husband of five years, has to rebuild her life and recover her self worth. More than the story of a woman abandoned, it is a story of love, friendship, and courage.
author: Anna Christian
